subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Love, a forward for the Cavaliers, traces his ability to throw the ball 75 feet down the court to the time his father spent playing alongside Wes Unseld in the early 1970s.
snippet: Love, a forward for the Cavaliers, traces his ability to throw the ball 75 feet down the court to the time his father spent playing alongside Wes Unseld in the early 1970s.
